name: The Eagle and the Sword
description:
Imagine the Age of Empires on the scale of a Total War game. Idea in development, battles in real time with more than 20,000 units. Develop cities, create an empire and conquer the world.

Sprites of roman and barbarian units from the mod Romae ad Bellum, age of empires 2

keys 1,2,3 you control the roman units

keys 4,5,6 you control the barbarian units.

click and drag to move units and change formation

F key enables them to fight.

you move on the screen with the keyboard arrows

keys + / - zoom

with the Q key you create roman units

with the W key you create barbarian units
